Action.author: phulei
Action.body: please let me know where you are running , if you are running on the aws , then please check the public ip of that instance.

Action.author: phulei
Action.body: go to cello directory and execute "make start" , looks like dashboard is missing from your list

Action.author: jufeng.yao
Action.body: I did this from beginning, and try again, same result : can't open operator dashboard

Action.body: ~jufeng.yao have u resolved the issue with latest code?
